headline.main: SENATE WILL TAKE UP WORLD-PEACE PROPOSALS; Debate Is Calculated to Bring an Airing Of Old Isolationist Objections

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 2 -- Key men who sought to postpone public debate on post-war problems lest feelings somewhere on earth be hurt, appear to have allayed their qualms and paved the way for an all-Congress expression on United Nations collaboration to preserve the peace for which the present battles are being waged.
abstract: pending Sen debate on post-war policy declaration discussed
snippet: WASHINGTON, Oct. 2 -- Key men who sought to postpone public debate on post-war problems lest feelings somewhere on earth be hurt, appear to have allayed their qualms and paved the way for an all-Congress expression on United Nations collaboration ...
